Smart Belt - A smart belt that tracks your daily activities, such as steps taken, calories burned, and sleep quality. It also includes a built-in music player and Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free calls. Confidence score: 0.8

Virtual Belt - A virtual belt that uses augmented reality to create a 3D image of your body, allowing you to try on different outfits and styles without physically changing clothes. It also includes a social feature that allows you to share your virtual outfits with friends and get feedback. Confidence score: 0.9

Glow Belt - A belt that emits a soft, calming glow, perfect for use during meditation or yoga practices. The glow can also be customized to suit your mood or the atmosphere of the room. Confidence score: 0.7

Power Belt - A belt that stores and charges your electronic devices, such as your phone or fitness tracker, while you're on the go. It also includes a built-in power bank and can be charged wirelessly. Confidence score: 0.8

Scent Belt - A belt that releases a fragrance based on your mood or environment. It can be programmed to release a calming scent during meditation or a more energizing scent during a workout. Confidence score: 0.9
